=== About Me ===
I am an Electrical and Electronics engineering Student at Govt. Engineering college Barton Hill.
I am interested in computer programming and free software. I have been our IEEE student branch webmaster. I have been using ubuntu since 2007.

=== Team Memberships ===
Presently I have no memberships.
=== Future Plans & Projects ===
To pass B tech in  Electrical and electronics and to do a Masters in avionics or AI.

=== Contributions to the Ubuntu Community ===
I have been an active volunteer and the secretary of the free software cell of our college and I have been active in promoting gnu/linux among students of our college.,I have contributed to the Malayalam translation launchpad team.
